With the coolness of the Clan Wolf warrior she was, Katya let it all out.

Katya: Vladimir Ward, my Khan, is seemingly prisoner of the Predacons.
Ragnar thinks he knows how to take us back, but I am not leaving
without Vladimir. I intend to challenge the Preds to a Trial of
Possession. Can I count on you to join us?

The wolf bot behind her looks vainly at Kup.

Blackfang: I told you it was ludicrous... There's no way Preds would
play by your rules...

Katya cuts him off bitterly.

Katya: Then what would you suggest? Leave him there? Not on my honor!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Assassin <rfa007@c...>"
<rfa007@c...> wrote:
> :: Kup ::
> 
> He looked at Katya, then to Blackfang, and back to Katya.
> 
> Kup: That depends. Explain exactly what your are planning. The idea 
> of a suicide mission, as Blackfang makes it seem, does not excite me, 
> lass.
